name: Pacbase: Avoid Functions with High Fan-out
description: Avoid Functions with High Fan-Out (Fan-Out > 20). The Fan-out of a Function is the number of other Functions that are performed ('called') by it. Multiple accesses to the same Function are counted as one single access. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: Nb of function with fan-out > X`!xA!`Value: fan-out
rationale: The higher the number of referenced Artifacts, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution as all updates in referenced Artifacts will have to be tested and taken into account.
